ygData.subject: Not sure if I like it.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I have played now for 3 days and so far it seems like a stupid game. What are the goals? What are we supposed to be doing?...other than just walking
ygData.messageBody:
Well I have played now for 3 days and so far it
seems like a stupid game. What are the goals? What are
we supposed to be doing?...other than just walking
around fighting stuff. Is there no thinking
involved?...nothing to find? What is it all about? Just seems like
nothing more frustration at this point. Maybe I expected
more. I had visions of something like the old Legend of
Zelda. ...you know? Why is it dark all the time?
